Hello, my name is Jae-sung Han. I am a student who wants to do excellent research that can contribute to the world based on my expertise. My hobby is playing basketball and guitar, and I sometimes enjoy solving algorithmic problems on leetcode . My research interests are computer vision, machine learning, and human-computer interaction.
